programme.desc: Providing prime-time context and analysis of the day's top stories, as well as in-depth reporting and storytelling from around the country and the globe.

programme.title: Jimmy Kimmel Live!
programme.desc: Emmy-winning funnyman Jimmy Kimmel serves up comedy bits and welcomes guests that include other comics, celebrities, athletes and musicians, as well as everyday people with unusual or compelling personal stories. Kimmel's family and friends take part in the festivities, including his Cousin Sal, Uncle Frank (until his death in 2011) and childhood friend Cleto Escobedo III, who leads the show's house band. Recurring segments include the FCC-pleasing This Week in Unnecessary Censorship in which they take TV clips and "bleep and blur things whether they need it or not," as Kimmel describes it. But it's too bad they consistently run out of time for Matt Damon's segment.

programme.title: Nightline
programme.desc: In-depth reporting on one or more of the major stories in the news, with occasional segments on pop culture; journalists Juju Chang and Byron Pitts share hosting duties for this late-night program.

programme.title: Sohneyan Meriyan Sunlay Sadawan
programme.desc: This program is based on viewers’ Naat requests, especially the ones said by the famous Sufi Saints Like Baba Bulhay Shah, Sultan Bahu .. The program is conducted in Punjabi language.Host: Safder Ali MohsinNaat Khuwan: Prof. A. Rauf Rufi.

programme.title: Paigham e Quran
programme.desc: A beautiful recitation of a quarter chapter from the Holy Qur’an, by a renowned Qari, and translation and interpretation of those recited verses in a brief manner.Format: 1+2 (Host+ Qari+ Scholar)Host: Salman GullScholars: Allama Shehzad Mujaddadi, Mufti Muhammad Amir and Mufti Ismail.

programme.title: Q-Qaida
programme.desc: Q Qaida is an introductory program that teaches beginners how to read the Arabic script for Quranic recitation. It starts with the basic Arabic letters and gradually introduces different vowel sounds and Quranic pronunciation rules. It is commonly used to establish a solid foundation for Tajweed and Quranic recitation.Host: Urooj IqbalParticipants: Children Format: Kids learning show (1+3 ).

programme.title: Daura e Tarjuma e Quran
programme.desc: This program contains recitation of the Holy Quran (verse by verse) and interpretation of those verses by renowned religious scholar Shuja Uddin Sheikh.

programme.title: Meri Pehchan
programme.desc: A female talk show having discussion over the persisting customs and norms of the society. Female scholars and experts from different fields of life and talks about the origins where those customs, rites and ritual come from or how they evolve with time, how they affect and influence our society, their pros and cons, and what does Islam has to say about them and see what criteria Islam provides to decide over adapting or rejecting to the emerging global changes, say social, technological etc. of today.Format: 1+1, Duration: 40 minutes, Host: Sehrish Sheikh.

programme.title: Hayat-e-Sahaba
programme.desc: The program will be based on the discussion on the lives of the Companions of the prophet Muhammad (pbuh). Format: talk show (1+1),Host: Qari Muhammad Younus, Scholar: Tahir Tabbasum.

programme.title: Roshni Sab Kay Leye
programme.desc: Roshni Sab Kay Leye (format 1+3) a program carrying the tag line of ARY Qtv as its Title and covering a vast range of topics related to Islam with support of Quran and Sunnah, the core purpose of program is to gather our mainstream and renowned Ulemas, Mufties and Scholars under one title, on one time slot, making it simple and convenient for our viewers to get interacted with ARY Qtv through this platform. The program hosted by Raees Ahmed.

programme.title: Qayadat e Nabawi
programme.desc: Qayadat e Nabawi is a thought-provoking new series that explores the leadership qualities of the Prophet Muhammad. In this program highlights how his noble character, strategic wisdom, and powerful decision-making can serve as a timeless guide for today’s leadersFormat: Podcast (1+1).

programme.title: Quran Suniay Aur Sunaiyyay
programme.desc: This program is basically design for the viewers who do not find any teacher to correct their recitation of Quran, They may contact on phone to the host for this purpose. Host: Mufti Sohail Raza Amjadi.

programme.desc: Frontiersman and Army officer Christopher Houston "Kit" Carson's many accomplishments are exaggerated in news stories and dime novels.

programme.title: Legends & Lies: The Real West
programme.desc: John Henry Holliday is a respectable Atlanta dentist diagnosed with a terminal disease; he resorts to a risky life of gambling and violence and meets Wyatt Earp, a bonafide outlaw with a story all his own.

programme.title: Legends & Lies: The Real West
programme.desc: Accounts from historians and direct descendants paint a portrait of the Old West gunfighter and gambler known as "Wild Bill" Hickok.

programme.title: Live: America Reports
programme.desc: A look at the latest news and headlines with Sandra Smith and John Roberts.

programme.title: Live: The Story With Martha MacCallum
programme.desc: Martha MacCallum brings the story of the times with her tough but fair interviews and straightforward analysis; "The Story" captures the voices that need to be heard and the people at the center of every history-shaping moment.

programme.title: Live: The Will Cain Show
programme.desc: Featuring Cain's signature podcast style and thoughtful perspective through conversations with newsmakers across politics, culture and sports.

programme.title: Live: Special Report With Bret Baier
programme.desc: News from inside the Beltway.

programme.title: Live: The Ingraham Angle
programme.desc: Laura Ingraham aims to cut through the Washington chatter to speak directly with unexpected voices and the actual people who are impacted by the news of the day.

programme.title: Live: Jesse Watters Primetime
programme.desc: Jesse Watters speaks with newsmakers from across America to present news with a clear and direct approach.

programme.title: Live: Hannity
programme.desc: Host Sean Hannity interviews political figures and newsmakers and offers his own conservative perspective on current events.

programme.title: Gutfeld!
programme.desc: Gutfeld looks at the news of the day through a satiric lens fused with pop culture and features refreshing takes on the day's top headlines from FNC personalities, authors, politicians, veterans and comedians.

programme.title: Case No 9
programme.desc:
Case No 9 is an inspiring story of Sehar, a courageous and ambitious young woman who challenges societal norms and becomes a beacon of resistance for others. Sehar, confident and driven, joins the company of Kamran, a domineering businessman feared by everyone for his egoistic and controlling nature. Unlike others, Sehar refuses to conform, letting her talent and integrity shine. Sehar’s defiance unsettles Kamran, who sets out to teach her a lesson. What follows is Sehar’s journey of redemption and resilience as she navigates the challenges thrown her way. Will Kamran succeed in teaching Sehar a lesson, or will she rise above his schemes? Can Sehar find the strength and support to overcome the odds, or will Kamran’s wealth and influence prove insurmountable? Geo and 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Syed Wajahat Hussain Writer: Shahzeb Khanzada
Cast: Saba Qamar, Faysal Quraishi, Junaid Khan, Aamina Sheikh, Rushna Khan, Shahnawaz Zaidi, Hina Bayat, Gohar Rasheed, Noor-ul-Hassan, Navin Waqar, Azra Mohyeddin, Ali Rehman Khan, Ahmed Randhawa, Zohreh Amir, Mizna Waqas, Kamran Jeelani, Faiza Gillani

programme.title: Sanwal Yaar Piya
programme.desc:
Sanwal Yaar Piya is a tale of love, fate, and the tangled lives of three individuals—Sanwal, Aliyaar, and Piya. Their destinies collide amidst challenges of loyalty, sacrifice, and a complicated past. Sanwal, a self-made man, and Aliyaar, a privileged son of a powerful figure, both fall for Piya, whose father hides dark secrets. In a world of deceit and power struggles, the trio must confront their emotions and pasts. As they navigate betrayal and power, their strength, loyalty, and resolve to fight for what is right are put to the test. Between Sanwal and Aliyaar, who will Piya choose? What dark secret is Piya’s father hiding? Will Sanwal lose to Aliyaar because of his wealth and power? How will the past shape the lives of Sanwal, Yaar, and Piya? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Danish Nawaz Writer: Hashim Nadeem Khan
Cast: Feroze Khan, Durefishan Saleem, Ahmed Ali Akbar, Yasir Nawaz, Zainab Qayoom, Deepak Perwani, Ali Tahir, Erum Akhtar, Sidra Niazi, Nayyer Ejaz, Raza Zaidi, Saqib Sumeer, Kamran Jeelani, Rashid Farooqi, Imran Qureshi, Yusra Irfan

programme.title: Haya
programme.desc:
Haya is a story of what happens when love dies and ambition takes its place. A young girl named Haya fails to gain his love, and her life takes a new turn. What begins as sorrow soon turns into fire—restless, bitter, unstoppable. Darakhshan Begum, unable to contain her, sends her away to the house of Mubarak Mastoor, another matriarch feared and obeyed. There, fate ties Haya to Rohan, the youngest son. His heart belongs to her, but hers has already turned cold. Love no longer guides her steps—power does. Slowly, Haya begins to plot against Mubarak Mastoor and her family. Soon, Mubarak Mastoor’s once lively home becomes a battlefield. Can Haya achieve her ambitions? Will Mubarak Mastoor succeed in stopping her? Will Rohan see who she really is? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Zahid Mehmood Writers: Noon Qalam & Abu Rashid
Cast: Sumbul Iqbal, Mirza Zain Baig, Saba Faisal, Shamim Hilaly, Farhan Ally Agha, Tipu Sharif, Faiza Gillani, Naveed Raza, Saima Qureshi, Fazyla Laasharie, Rehma Zaman, Asim Mehmood, Junaid Akhtar, Nida Khan, Hassam Khan, Aliya Jamshed, Nain Sukh

programme.title: Shikanja
programme.desc:
Shikanja is a gripping tale of deceit, deception, and the price of unchecked ambition. Rani, a beautiful yet manipulative woman, loves Saqib and cunningly marries him. However, her obsession with control soon begins to destroy everything Saqib holds dear. Saqib’s sisters, Fizza and Rida, become the primary victims of Rani’s cruelty. Zaroon, Rani’s brother, deeply loves Fizza, but Rani’s envy and desire for power stand in their way. Her schemes unleash chaos that shatters relationships and tears the family apart. As she tightens her grip on the household, Rani manipulates everyone, reducing Fizza and Rida to mere servants of her will. Amidst the turmoil, Zaroon remains the only beacon of hope – determined to protect Fizza from Rani’s deceit. Will Zaroon save Fizza from Rani’s manipulation? Will Saqib uncover the truth about his wife? And will love, truth, and justice triumph over Rani’s unrelenting hunger for control? Writer: Saira Arif Director: Kashif Ahmed Butt Production House: TNI Entertainment
Cast: Azekah Daniel, Asad Siddiqui, Washma Fatima, Furqan Qureshi, Izzah Malik, Arslan Asad Butt, Kinza Malik, Shaheen Khan, Kaiser Khan Nizamani, Rabia Abid Ali, Laiba Rehman, Alishba Malik, Hina Sheikh, Hamza Shykh, Sara Nadeem

programme.title: Mohra
programme.desc:
Mohra is a powerful story about how ego and greed can blind people and make them forget the difference between right and wrong. One decision made out of pride or for money can change many lives including the lives of innocent people. Alizay is a confident and smart girl who lives with her mother and sister Anooshay. Even though they belong to a lower middle class family Alizay is happy with what she has and shares a strong bond with her sister. On the other hand is the Hamdani family. Fareed and Armeen live with their children Hamza, Sikandar, and Nimra. Fareed and Hamza are kind and grounded but Sikandar and Nimra follow their mother's pride and develop an ego that slowly starts to affect their decisions. An unforeseen tragedy shatters Alizay, setting her on a path of vengeance against the Hamdani family. What tragic incident shattered Alizay’s world? How is the Hamdani family connected to it? Can Alizay take revenge on the Hamdani family? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Mohsin Mirza Writer: Tahir Nazeer
Cast: Mikaal Zulfiqar, Laiba Khan, Aagha Ali, Syeda Tuba Anwar, Azra Mohyeddin, Behroz Sabzwari, Nida Mumtaz, Nazlee Nasr, Asim Mehmood, Lubna Aslam, Namra Shahid

programme.title: Bahar Nagar
programme.desc:
Bahar Begum is a sturdy and respected matriarch who proudly rules her household. Bahar is a proud mother of four sons, three of whom are married to the daughters of Babu Bhai and Zebunissa. Bahar’s youngest son and Babu Bhai’s youngest daughter also fall in love but their relationship soons falls victim to jealousy and opposition. At the center of this turmoil is Nargis, Bahar’s eldest daughter-in-law, who craves power and will stop at nothing to claim Bahar’s throne. Soon, the once harmonious home of Bahar transforms into a battleground of generations where loyalties are tested! Can Bahar save her home from her daughter-in-law’s schemes? Will Bahar’s youngest son and Babu Bhai’s youngest daughter be united in marriage? Who will triumph in the battle between Bahar Begum and Nargis? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Mazhar Moin Writers: Noon Qalam & Sajjad Haider Zaidi
Cast: Hina Dilpazeer Khan, Javeria Saud, Hammad Farooqui, Sana Askari, Ahmad Hassan, Hirra Sheikh, Hafsa Butt, Hammad Khan, Raza Zaidi, Faiza Saleem, Alee Hassan Shah, Maham Aamir, Rubab Rasheed, Anees Alam

programme.title: Mannat Murad
programme.desc:
Mannat is a beautiful young girl who hails from a progressive family that values love, care, and mutual respect. Raised in an environment where everyone's choices are respected, Mannat enjoys the freedom to make her own decisions. Following the untimely demise of her parents, she finds support from her elder brother, Nafees, who showers her with affection. On the other hand, Murad belongs to a conservative family where his mother, the matriarch, wields significant influence over his life choices. As the only son, Murad is burdened with the responsibility of fulfilling his family's expectations. Soft-spoken and romantic by nature, Murad finds himself unable to defy his mother's authority, especially after the passing of his father. Despite their starkly contrasting backgrounds, Mannat and Murad's hearts find solace in each other's presence, and they fall deeply in love. However, their families' interference creates misunderstandings between Mannat and Murad, testing the strength of their bond. Will their families agree to their union? Will Mannat's family, with their open-mindedness, find common ground with Murad's conservative household? Can Mannat and Murad's love for each other withstand the motives of their families, who seek to create further misunderstandings between them? , , Written by: Nadia Akhtar Directed by: Syed Wajahat Hussain Produced by: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Production House: 7th Sky Entertainment
Cast: Iqra Aziz, Talha Chahour, Irsa Ghazal, Noor ul Hassan, Uzma Hassan, Tipu Sharif, Faiza Gillani, Mizna Waqas, Sana Nadir, Rehma Zaman, Ali Safina, Hammad Siddiqui, Anam Tanveer, Salma Baig, Parveen Akbar, Rahat Ghani

programme.title: Mohra
programme.desc:
Mohra is a powerful story about how ego and greed can blind people and make them forget the difference between right and wrong. One decision made out of pride or for money can change many lives including the lives of innocent people. Alizay is a confident and smart girl who lives with her mother and sister Anooshay. Even though they belong to a lower middle class family Alizay is happy with what she has and shares a strong bond with her sister. On the other hand is the Hamdani family. Fareed and Armeen live with their children Hamza, Sikandar, and Nimra. Fareed and Hamza are kind and grounded but Sikandar and Nimra follow their mother's pride and develop an ego that slowly starts to affect their decisions. An unforeseen tragedy shatters Alizay, setting her on a path of vengeance against the Hamdani family. What tragic incident shattered Alizay’s world? How is the Hamdani family connected to it? Can Alizay take revenge on the Hamdani family? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Mohsin Mirza Writer: Tahir Nazeer
Cast: Mikaal Zulfiqar, Laiba Khan, Aagha Ali, Syeda Tuba Anwar, Azra Mohyeddin, Behroz Sabzwari, Nida Mumtaz, Nazlee Nasr, Asim Mehmood, Lubna Aslam, Namra Shahid

programme.title: Mohra

Cast: Mikaal Zulfiqar, Laiba Khan, Aagha Ali, Syeda Tuba Anwar, Azra Mohyeddin, Behroz Sabzwari, Nida Mumtaz, Nazlee Nasr, Asim Mehmood, Lubna Aslam, Namra Shahid

programme.title: Shikanja
programme.desc:
Shikanja is a gripping tale of deceit, deception, and the price of unchecked ambition. Rani, a beautiful yet manipulative woman, loves Saqib and cunningly marries him. However, her obsession with control soon begins to destroy everything Saqib holds dear. Saqib’s sisters, Fizza and Rida, become the primary victims of Rani’s cruelty. Zaroon, Rani’s brother, deeply loves Fizza, but Rani’s envy and desire for power stand in their way. Her schemes unleash chaos that shatters relationships and tears the family apart. As she tightens her grip on the household, Rani manipulates everyone, reducing Fizza and Rida to mere servants of her will. Amidst the turmoil, Zaroon remains the only beacon of hope – determined to protect Fizza from Rani’s deceit. Will Zaroon save Fizza from Rani’s manipulation? Will Saqib uncover the truth about his wife? And will love, truth, and justice triumph over Rani’s unrelenting hunger for control? Writer: Saira Arif Director: Kashif Ahmed Butt Production House: TNI Entertainment
Cast: Azekah Daniel, Asad Siddiqui, Washma Fatima, Furqan Qureshi, Izzah Malik, Arslan Asad Butt, Kinza Malik, Shaheen Khan, Kaiser Khan Nizamani, Rabia Abid Ali, Laiba Rehman, Alishba Malik, Hina Sheikh, Hamza Shykh, Sara Nadeem

programme.title: Sanwal Yaar Piya
programme.desc:
Sanwal Yaar Piya is a tale of love, fate, and the tangled lives of three individuals—Sanwal, Aliyaar, and Piya. Their destinies collide amidst challenges of loyalty, sacrifice, and a complicated past. Sanwal, a self-made man, and Aliyaar, a privileged son of a powerful figure, both fall for Piya, whose father hides dark secrets. In a world of deceit and power struggles, the trio must confront their emotions and pasts. As they navigate betrayal and power, their strength, loyalty, and resolve to fight for what is right are put to the test. Between Sanwal and Aliyaar, who will Piya choose? What dark secret is Piya’s father hiding? Will Sanwal lose to Aliyaar because of his wealth and power? How will the past shape the lives of Sanwal, Yaar, and Piya? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Danish Nawaz Writer: Hashim Nadeem Khan
Cast: Feroze Khan, Durefishan Saleem, Ahmed Ali Akbar, Yasir Nawaz, Zainab Qayoom, Deepak Perwani, Ali Tahir, Erum Akhtar, Sidra Niazi, Nayyer Ejaz, Raza Zaidi, Saqib Sumeer, Kamran Jeelani, Rashid Farooqi, Imran Qureshi, Yusra Irfan

programme.title: Haya
programme.desc:
Haya is a story of what happens when love dies and ambition takes its place. A young girl named Haya fails to gain his love, and her life takes a new turn. What begins as sorrow soon turns into fire—restless, bitter, unstoppable. Darakhshan Begum, unable to contain her, sends her away to the house of Mubarak Mastoor, another matriarch feared and obeyed. There, fate ties Haya to Rohan, the youngest son. His heart belongs to her, but hers has already turned cold. Love no longer guides her steps—power does. Slowly, Haya begins to plot against Mubarak Mastoor and her family. Soon, Mubarak Mastoor’s once lively home becomes a battlefield. Can Haya achieve her ambitions? Will Mubarak Mastoor succeed in stopping her? Will Rohan see who she really is? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Zahid Mehmood Writers: Noon Qalam & Abu Rashid
Cast: Sumbul Iqbal, Mirza Zain Baig, Saba Faisal, Shamim Hilaly, Farhan Ally Agha, Tipu Sharif, Faiza Gillani, Naveed Raza, Saima Qureshi, Fazyla Laasharie, Rehma Zaman, Asim Mehmood, Junaid Akhtar, Nida Khan, Hassam Khan, Aliya Jamshed, Nain Sukh

programme.title: Bahar Nagar
programme.desc:
Bahar Begum is a sturdy and respected matriarch who proudly rules her household. Bahar is a proud mother of four sons, three of whom are married to the daughters of Babu Bhai and Zebunissa. Bahar’s youngest son and Babu Bhai’s youngest daughter also fall in love but their relationship soons falls victim to jealousy and opposition. At the center of this turmoil is Nargis, Bahar’s eldest daughter-in-law, who craves power and will stop at nothing to claim Bahar’s throne. Soon, the once harmonious home of Bahar transforms into a battleground of generations where loyalties are tested! Can Bahar save her home from her daughter-in-law’s schemes? Will Bahar’s youngest son and Babu Bhai’s youngest daughter be united in marriage? Who will triumph in the battle between Bahar Begum and Nargis? 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Mazhar Moin Writers: Noon Qalam & Sajjad Haider Zaidi
Cast: Hina Dilpazeer Khan, Javeria Saud, Hammad Farooqui, Sana Askari, Ahmad Hassan, Hirra Sheikh, Hafsa Butt, Hammad Khan, Raza Zaidi, Faiza Saleem, Alee Hassan Shah, Maham Aamir, Rubab Rasheed, Anees Alam

programme.title: Case No 9
programme.desc:
Case No 9 is an inspiring story of Sehar, a courageous and ambitious young woman who challenges societal norms and becomes a beacon of resistance for others. Sehar, confident and driven, joins the company of Kamran, a domineering businessman feared by everyone for his egoistic and controlling nature. Unlike others, Sehar refuses to conform, letting her talent and integrity shine. Sehar’s defiance unsettles Kamran, who sets out to teach her a lesson. What follows is Sehar’s journey of redemption and resilience as she navigates the challenges thrown her way. Will Kamran succeed in teaching Sehar a lesson, or will she rise above his schemes? Can Sehar find the strength and support to overcome the odds, or will Kamran’s wealth and influence prove insurmountable? Geo and 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Syed Wajahat Hussain Writer: Shahzeb Khanzada
Cast: Saba Qamar, Faysal Quraishi, Junaid Khan, Aamina Sheikh, Rushna Khan, Shahnawaz Zaidi, Hina Bayat, Gohar Rasheed, Noor-ul-Hassan, Navin Waqar, Azra Mohyeddin, Ali Rehman Khan, Ahmed Randhawa, Zohreh Amir, Mizna Waqas, Kamran Jeelani, Faiza Gillani

programme.title: Mann Mast Malang
programme.desc:
Mann Mast Malang is a love story that traces the journey of two families who, once close and united by their children's engagement, become sworn enemies due to a single incident. As the story unfolds, Kabeer and Riya, former fiancés turned enemies, start to grow closer and eventually fall in love. Their love story faces the challenge of uniting their feuding families, as they strive to make their love successful against all odds. 7th Sky Entertainment Presentation Producers: Abdullah Kadwani & Asad Qureshi Director: Ali Faizan Writer: Nooran Makhdoom

programme.title: The Late Show With Stephen Colbert
programme.desc: Improv actor and comic Stephen Colbert flexes the hosting muscles he honed over nearly 1,500 episodes of the popular and critically celebrated "The Colbert Report" at the helm of this long-running late-night talk show. Following the genre's classic formula, each show kicks off with a monologue and a look at recent headlines, and features sketch comedy, celebrity interviews and musical performances. Joining Colbert is his bandleader, Julliard-trained Jon Batiste, and house band Stay Human. The show is filmed in New York's famed Ed Sullivan Theater, the longtime home of "The Late Show.".

programme.title: Aik Bhool
programme.desc: Aik Bhool is a story of love, sacrifice, betrayal, and redemption. Batool gives up her love for family honor, while Hadia’s one mistake changes everything. Saahil is torn between loyalty and heartbreak, and Aashir, wounded by betrayal, struggles with trust. Sarwat Ateeq, a strong mother, fights to keep her family together. Their journey takes a darker turn when Kashaan’s greed and ambition collide with love and loyalty. Promises break, sacrifices leave scars, and every heart pays the price. Aik Bhool is a tale where one mistake changes every destiny.

programme.title: Pamaal
programme.desc: Malika defies all odds for love, walking away from comfort, tradition and the safety of the family. But what she found wasn’t the fairytale she imagined. With Raza, stability turns into restraint as her spirit begins to fade. Pamaal is a story of love, loss, and rediscovery, where the end of one journey becomes the beginning of another.

programme.title: Visaal E Ishq
programme.desc: Visaal-e-Ishq is a story of love, sacrifice, and painful choices Wahaj finds himself caught between two cousins Anoushey and Wajiha despite loving Wajiha, he is forced to get engaged to Anoushey.A web of misunderstandings, conspiracies, and betrayals unfolds Wajiha ends up in a miserable marriage while Anoushey faces her own trials but loyalty forgiveness and fate lead hearts back to where they belong! Visaal-e-Ishq a tale of love tested and truth prevailing

programme.title: DuniyaPur
programme.desc: DuniyaPur is a gripping Pakistani drama series by Green Entertainment that dives into the fierce rivalry between two powerful families, the Adams and the Nawabs, in a fictional town scarred by violence and ego. After the tragic deaths of their eldest sons, Shahmeer and Ana, the younger generation, played by Khushhal Khan and Ramsha Khan, tries to rewrite the legacy of hate with love, reconciliation, and courage. Directed by Shahid Shafaat and written by Radain Shah, the show blends action, emotion, and high-stakes drama, making it one of the most cinematic and high-budget productions in Pakistani TV history.

programme.title: DuniyaPur
programme.desc: DuniyaPur is a gripping Pakistani drama series by Green Entertainment that dives into the fierce rivalry between two powerful families, the Adams and the Nawabs, in a fictional town scarred by violence and ego. After the tragic deaths of their eldest sons, Shahmeer and Ana, the younger generation, played by Khushhal Khan and Ramsha Khan, tries to rewrite the legacy of hate with love, reconciliation, and courage. Directed by Shahid Shafaat and written by Radain Shah, the show blends action, emotion, and high-stakes drama, making it one of the most cinematic and high-budget productions in Pakistani TV history.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is murdered in a drive-by shooting. When a mobile phone trace incriminates a killer, it's up to a forensic geologist to find evidence that he was at the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is found dead, her boyfriend confesses to her murder. However, in a strange twist, so does another man; police must determine which is the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A high school gym teacher gives his friend a ride home but never returns; his wife and friend receive letters saying he started a new life, but they suspect foul play despite no body being discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl is killed in her own home by her mother and father. Her parents said they acted in self-defense, but the forensic evidence indicates otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is found stabbed to death after a night in a strip club; a drop of blood on a bedspread becomes critical evidence five years later.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After police identify a murder victim thanks to her butterfly necklace, they discover several co-workers had vendettas against the victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The brutal murder of a construction site foreman looks like the work of a disgruntled employee, but forensic science points to an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A shooting victim mutters the name of her apparent assailant before dying, but fingerprint comparisons, handwriting analysis, ballistics and DNA testing show someone else close to home is the true killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman's story seemed far fetched; she tells investigators that a man broke into her home wearing only underwear and gloves, killed her boyfriend and raped and terrorized her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a Delaware man's mother is found dead, he tells a story that's so improbable police think it can't possibly be true.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A family vacation turns into a terrifying search for a missing wife and baby, then becomes a manhunt for a killer who committed a horrific crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A DNA dragnet catches a killer eight years after the kidnapping, rape and murder of a college coed in Oklahoma.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A nosy neighbor with a disturbing obsession becomes a suspect in a woman's murder at an upscale apartment complex; police discover an incredible link to an unrelated murder thousands of miles away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college student turns up dead and her boyfriend becomes a prime suspect when blood splatters are discovered on his wall.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Texas police hunt frantically for a brutal rapist. No one knows where he'll strike next, but given the increasingly violent nature of his crimes, he must be found soon.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When detectives find a mismatched button in relation to a woman's death, they know they can follow the clue back to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman heads home after church, but never makes it there alive, triggering a homicide investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Volunteers and police spend weeks searching for a missing girl. A psychic later leads them to a field where the body was found.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A forensic scientist uses his skills to preserve a footprint left in snow to help authorities nab two men suspected of robbing an Ontario couple and shooting the husband in the head.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Fingerprints taken from a piece of cloth help solve the rape and murder of a 22-year-old woman in Henrico County, Va.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The FBI profiles a suspect in the kidnapping and murder of a 6-year-old girl during an evening church service; a witness leads authorities to the likely killer, but then becomes a victim herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Photographs found in a dumpster lead to the killer of Los Angeles model Linda Sobek; the man claims he did not intentionally kill her despite evidence to the contrary.

programme.desc: A family drama that explores love, jealousy, and power struggles among daughters-in-law fighting for respect, affection, and control in one household.

programme.desc:
The epic saga of Sultan Salahuddin Ayyubi continues with Season 2 on HUM TV, captivating audiences with even greater grandeur, powerful storytelling, and inspiring portrayals of one of history’s greatest Muslim leaders.
Writer:Isa Yildiz, Director:Sedat Inci, Producer:Akli Films, Time:MONDAY - FRIDAY9:00 PM, Repeat Time:TUESDAY - SATURDAY04:00 PM, Cast:Uğur Güneş,Dilin Döğer,Mehmet Ali Nuroğlu,Kaan Çakır,Hakan Vanlı,Ali Ersan Duru,Erdinc Gulener,Ekin Türkmen,Tuvana Türkay,Murat Han,Buse Varol,Seda Yıldız.

programme.title: Parizaad
programme.desc:
HUM TV’s drama serial Parizaad revolves around the lead role of same name played by Ahmed Ali Akbar, and how his interactions with different characters act as life-altering experiences for him. The rollercoaster of his life goes from completely nomad to someone he never imagined to be, which also keeps the audience glued to their screens.
Writer:Hashim Nadeem, Director:Shehzad Kashmiri, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Cast:Nauman Ijaz,Ahmed Ali Akbar,Syed Muhammad Ahmed,Urwa Hocane,Ushna Shah,Yumna Zaidi,Saboor Ali,Mashal Khan,Tipu Shah,Kiran Tabeer,Leyla Zuberi,Madiha Rizvi,Malik Hamid Raza,Nadia Afgan,Paras Masroor,Saad Azhar,Dilnasheen Mazhar,Tahira Imam,Ismat Zaidi,Anjum Habibi,Faiz Chuhan,Saleem Mairaj,Nargis Rasheed,Munazzah Arif,Raza Abid,Salma Hassan.

programme.title: Masoom
programme.desc:
Masoom tells the story of Neelo (Sonia Hussyn), a lively and free-spirited young woman whose heart beats only for Dilshad (Imran Ashraf). Her playful affection soon turns into deep, all-consuming love. But fate disrupts her dreams, and in an unexpected twist, Neelo finds herself married to Wijdan (also played by Imran Ashraf), a stranger bound to her by circumstance.
Writer:Content Line, Director:Barkat Siddiqui, Producer:Barkat Siddiqui & MD, Time:SUNDAY8:00 PM, Repeat Time:MONDAY9:00 AM, Cast:Sonia Hussain,Mikaal Zulfiqar,Imran Ashraf,Sidra Niazi,Waseem Abbas,Naveen Naqvi,Shaista Jabeen,Abu Hurairah.

programme.title: Meesni
programme.desc:
Meesni is the story of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. But will Sahira be the same once she becomes a mother? Will she be able to change her ways or will her daughters have to bear the burdens of her past?Meesni drama encompasses the actions and tale of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. She was born in a poor family and has improbable dreams of getting rich by means of deception and ploys. She uses her beauty as a weapon to pierce through people’s hearts and lives. Preying on two brothers one after the other, Sahira destroys the familial bond for her treacherous reasons and tears the family apart.Zaid, younger brother of Waleed falls prey to Sahira’s gambits first, and is heartbroken after her deception. The same fate follows Waleed, when Sahira deliberately enters his life and persuade him into her charms. The story continues to reveal the tragic destruction of the families on account of Sahira’s actions. The anticipation that Sahira might change her ways when she becomes a mother also crushes when she abandons her daughter heartlessly to carry on with her selfish endeavors. People continue to perish around her but nothing seems to break her conducts on being callous and putting herself above everything, even above morality.
Writer:Muhammad Asif, Director:Meer Sikandar, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Cast:Sharmeen Khan,Faiq Khan,Najiba Faiz,Leyla Zuberi,Tahira Imam,Sarah Khan.

programme.title: Hum TV OST
programme.desc: A show that plays the best Hum TV Original Soundtracks from famous dramas, back to back.

programme.title: Jama Taqseem
programme.desc:
Jama Taqseem is a compelling drama that delves into the intricate dynamics of a joint family, exploring the complexities of generational gaps and diverse parenting styles.

programme.title: Meesni
programme.desc:
Meesni is the story of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. But will Sahira be the same once she becomes a mother? Will she be able to change her ways or will her daughters have to bear the burdens of her past?Meesni drama encompasses the actions and tale of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. She was born in a poor family and has improbable dreams of getting rich by means of deception and ploys. She uses her beauty as a weapon to pierce through people’s hearts and lives. Preying on two brothers one after the other, Sahira destroys the familial bond for her treacherous reasons and tears the family apart.Zaid, younger brother of Waleed falls prey to Sahira’s gambits first, and is heartbroken after her deception. The same fate follows Waleed, when Sahira deliberately enters his life and persuade him into her charms. The story continues to reveal the tragic destruction of the families on account of Sahira’s actions. The anticipation that Sahira might change her ways when she becomes a mother also crushes when she abandons her daughter heartlessly to carry on with her selfish endeavors. People continue to perish around her but nothing seems to break her conducts on being callous and putting herself above everything, even above morality.
Writer:Muhammad Asif, Director:Meer Sikandar, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Cast:Sharmeen Khan,Faiq Khan,Najiba Faiz,Leyla Zuberi,Tahira Imam,Sarah Khan.

programme.title: Meesni
programme.desc:
Meesni is the story of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. But will Sahira be the same once she becomes a mother? Will she be able to change her ways or will her daughters have to bear the burdens of her past?Meesni drama encompasses the actions and tale of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. She was born in a poor family and has improbable dreams of getting rich by means of deception and ploys. She uses her beauty as a weapon to pierce through people’s hearts and lives. Preying on two brothers one after the other, Sahira destroys the familial bond for her treacherous reasons and tears the family apart.Zaid, younger brother of Waleed falls prey to Sahira’s gambits first, and is heartbroken after her deception. The same fate follows Waleed, when Sahira deliberately enters his life and persuade him into her charms. The story continues to reveal the tragic destruction of the families on account of Sahira’s actions. The anticipation that Sahira might change her ways when she becomes a mother also crushes when she abandons her daughter heartlessly to carry on with her selfish endeavors. People continue to perish around her but nothing seems to break her conducts on being callous and putting herself above everything, even above morality.
Writer:Muhammad Asif, Director:Meer Sikandar, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Cast:Sharmeen Khan,Faiq Khan,Najiba Faiz,Leyla Zuberi,Tahira Imam,Sarah Khan.

programme.desc:
Masoom tells the story of Neelo (Sonia Hussyn), a lively and free-spirited young woman whose heart beats only for Dilshad (Imran Ashraf). programme.title: Goonj
programme.desc:
Goonj centers on Zarnab, a bright, self-reliant young woman from a middle-class background, raised by her supportive father after losing her mother. Her determination and talent earn her professional success, but her journey takes a darker turn when she becomes the target of Nabeel, a bitter and misogynistic colleague.

Writer:Sarwat Nazir, Director:Ali Hassan, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Time:WEDNESDAY - THURSDAY8:00 PM, Repeat Time:THURSDAY - FRIDAY9:00 AM, Cast:Mawra Hocane,Talha Chahour,Javed Shaikh,Beo Zafar,Madiha Rizvi,Hassan Ahmed,Amna Malik,Saad Azhar,Amna khan,Deepak.

programme.title: Goonj
programme.desc:
Goonj centers on Zarnab, a bright, self-reliant young woman from a middle-class background, raised by her supportive father after losing her mother. Her determination and talent earn her professional success, but her journey takes a darker turn when she becomes the target of Nabeel, a bitter and misogynistic colleague.
Writer:Qarb Abbas, Director:Wajahat Rauf, Producer:Showcase Production & MD Productions, Time:FRIDAY8:00 PM, Repeat Time:SATURDAY9:00 AM, Cast:Komal Meer,Feroz Kadri,Eman Syed,Mechalle Mumtaz,Shaheen Khan,Sajeer Uddin,Khalid Anum,Gohar Rasheed,Ali Safina,Seerha Asghar,Mansoor Ali Khan,Hira Tareen,Rehan Saeed,Faisal Naqvi,Aneesha Ali,Anees Alam,Azam Khan,Shayan Malik.

programme.title: Jinn Ki Shadi Un Ki Shadi
programme.desc:
Jinn Ki Shadi Unki Shadi weaves a tale of love, loyalty, and supernatural intrigue. The story follows two brothers, Asad and Ali, who are forced to move into their ancestral mansion in Islamabad after their wealthy parents are brutally murdered by the vengeful jinn, Azar.
Writer:Syed Nabeel, Director:Saife Hassan, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Time:MONDAY-TUESDAY8:00 PM, Repeat Time:TUESDAY-WEDNESDAY9:00 AM, Cast:Wahaj Ali,Sehar Khan,Arslan Naseer,Romaisa Khan,Sidra Niazi,Syed Jibran,Laiba Butt,Irfan Motiwala,Nadia Afgan,Tamkenat.

programme.title: Meesni
programme.desc:
Meesni is the story of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. But will Sahira be the same once she becomes a mother? Will she be able to change her ways or will her daughters have to bear the burdens of her past?Meesni drama encompasses the actions and tale of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. She was born in a poor family and has improbable dreams of getting rich by means of deception and ploys. She uses her beauty as a weapon to pierce through people’s hearts and lives. Preying on two brothers one after the other, Sahira destroys the familial bond for her treacherous reasons and tears the family apart.Zaid, younger brother of Waleed falls prey to Sahira’s gambits first, and is heartbroken after her deception. The same fate follows Waleed, when Sahira deliberately enters his life and persuade him into her charms. The story continues to reveal the tragic destruction of the families on account of Sahira’s actions. The anticipation that Sahira might change her ways when she becomes a mother also crushes when she abandons her daughter heartlessly to carry on with her selfish endeavors. People continue to perish around her but nothing seems to break her conducts on being callous and putting herself above everything, even above morality.
Writer:Muhammad Asif, Director:Meer Sikandar, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Cast:Sharmeen Khan,Faiq Khan,Najiba Faiz,Leyla Zuberi,Tahira Imam,Sarah Khan.

programme.title: Masoom

programme.title: Parizaad
programme.desc:
HUM TV’s drama serial Parizaad revolves around the lead role of same name played by Ahmed Ali Akbar, and how his interactions with different characters act as life-altering experiences for him. The rollercoaster of his life goes from completely nomad to someone he never imagined to be, which also keeps the audience glued to their screens.

programme.title: Goonj
programme.desc:
Goonj centers on Zarnab, a bright, self-reliant young woman from a middle-class background, raised by her supportive father after losing her mother. Her determination and talent earn her professional success, but her journey takes a darker turn when she becomes the target of Nabeel, a bitter and misogynistic colleague.
Writer:Qarb Abbas, Director:Wajahat Rauf, Producer:Showcase Production & MD Productions, Time:FRIDAY8:00 PM, Repeat Time:SATURDAY9:00 AM, Cast:Komal Meer,Feroz Kadri,Eman Syed,Mechalle Mumtaz,Shaheen Khan,Sajeer Uddin,Khalid Anum,Gohar Rasheed,Ali Safina,Seerha Asghar,Mansoor Ali Khan,Hira Tareen,Rehan Saeed,Faisal Naqvi,Aneesha Ali,Anees Alam,Azam Khan,Shayan Malik.

programme.title: Meesni
programme.desc:
Meesni is the story of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. But will Sahira be the same once she becomes a mother? Will she be able to change her ways or will her daughters have to bear the burdens of her past?Meesni drama encompasses the actions and tale of Sahira, a girl who wants it all and doesn’t care about who gets hurt in the way. A girl who has never been a good daughter, sister or a good wife. She was born in a poor family and has improbable dreams of getting rich by means of deception and ploys. She uses her beauty as a weapon to pierce through people’s hearts and lives. Preying on two brothers one after the other, Sahira destroys the familial bond for her treacherous reasons and tears the family apart.Zaid, younger brother of Waleed falls prey to Sahira’s gambits first, and is heartbroken after her deception. The same fate follows Waleed, when Sahira deliberately enters his life and persuade him into her charms. The story continues to reveal the tragic destruction of the families on account of Sahira’s actions. The anticipation that Sahira might change her ways when she becomes a mother also crushes when she abandons her daughter heartlessly to carry on with her selfish endeavors. People continue to perish around her but nothing seems to break her conducts on being callous and putting herself above everything, even above morality.
Writer:Muhammad Asif, Director:Meer Sikandar, Producer:Momina Duraid Productions, Cast:Sharmeen Khan,Faiq Khan,Najiba Faiz,Leyla Zuberi,Tahira Imam,Sarah Khan.

programme.title: Hum Kahan Ke Sachay Thay
programme.desc:
Drama serial Hum Kahan Ke Sachay Thay, one of the much-anticipated dramas of the year 2021, is based on a novel of the same name written by renowned playwright Umera Ahmed and directed by ace director Farooq Rind of Ishq Zahe Naseeb and Pyar Ke Sadqay fame. One of the main highlights of the serial is the television return of Mahira Khan after six long years.Hum Kahan Ke Sachay Thay offers mystery, suspense and strong female characters and is a story of love, hate and complex relationships. The serial revolves around three cousins Mehreen, Mashal and Aswad, played by Mahira Khan, Kubra Khan and Usman Mukhtar respectively.Mehreen is a troubled and conflicted child haunted by the past actions of her parents while Mashal is vivacious, carefree and thinks everything revolves around her. Their cousin Aswad is a young and handsome who is caught between the clash of egos of these two girls.
Writer:Umera Ahmed, Director:Farooq Rind, Producer:Nina Kashif, Cast:Mahira Khan,Kubra Khan,Usman Mukthar,Haroon Shahid,Shameem Halali,Ali Tahir,Huma Nawab,Iqra Shabbir,Khalid Malik,Laila Wasti,Zainab Qayoom,Abida Zehra,Sidra Khan,Kaif Ghaznavi,Zaara Ahmed,Haya Khan.
